title: Timings
content: When exactly does mrd open, like the badminton court and running track?

comments.body: Like gjbc court you can play there? With booking or without?
as far as i know, there's no booking as such, if the courts are free u just hv to enter ur name and srn ig and u can play as long as u hv proper shoes
Off mrd but does the gjb one require booking?
